call_control_id.description: Unique identifier and token for controlling the call.

call_leg_id.description: ID that is unique to the call and can be used to correlate webhook events.

call_session_id.description: ID that is unique to the call session and can be used to correlate webhook events. Call session is a group of related call legs that logically belong to the same phone call, e.g. an inbound and outbound leg of a transferred call.

channels.description: When `dual`, final audio file has the first leg on channel A, and the rest on channel B.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

download_urls.description: The links to download the recording files.

mp3.description: Link to download the recording in mp3 format.

wav.description: Link to download the recording in wav format.

duration_millis.description: The duration of the recording in milliseconds.

recording_started_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the recording started.

recording_ended_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the recording ended.

source.description: The kind of event that led to this recording being created.

status.description: The status of the recording. Only resources for `completed` recordings are currently supported.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was updated.
